posts.post_title: LTB PSA 1 or 1.5 Cobb, Johnson, Mathewson & Young
posts.post_content:
As the title states, looking to buy PSA Graded 1 or 1.5 of the players listed above. 

More interested in visual appeal than pose or back right now.

May go up to a PSA 2 or 2.5 if the value is there
